item.title: Pokemon Tower Defense
item.author: Timon Venninckx
item.description:
Introduction

Pokemon Tower Defense is a project that i started because i was playing the original game alot but the servers happened to go down. I wanted to challenge myself to make this game with SFML a multimedia library which i didn’t have much knowledge of at the time.

What I learned

I learned a lot about memory management in this project what to look out for, what to do and what NOT to do.

item.title: Fortnite clone
item.author: Timon Venninckx
item.description:
:)

This is a very old project where I made a Fortnite clone using unreal engine with mostly blueprints. At the time I really wanted to recreate the building mechanics that Fortnite had. In the process of making this game I learned a lot about:

  • Data structures
  • Blueprints
  • Replication

This is quite an old project so I don’t have much to say about it anymore but I am proud of the end result.
